basics.name: PHAM BA CUONG QUOC
basics.label: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary:
Im a Data Scientist, Deep Learning Engineer, Big Data Engineer, Blogger. I am fascinated about deep learning, computer vision. I 
love to share my knowledge at pbcquoc.github.io and contribute to Vietnamese open source.

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Science
other: Implement a novel model to generate image description.

highlights: Lead a team to solve document digitization problems.

work.name: Zalo Group, VNG Corporation
highlights: I build a dashboard for our machine learning system that supports ab testing and monitor various measurements.
I build a large-scale machine learning system that store, detect relationships of over 80 million users.

Extract edge 
attribute of the super graph (16 billion edges) about their distance in several days

Build a machine learning 
model using these features to classify their relationship.
Suggest and build a smart notification system
Build a movie recommender system to serve 600k users using predictionio, mllib spark, scala.
Combine these models using a linear model.
Make alert system for our system to track anomaly and email to related person in time.
Use user-item logs of our log system

Proposal and build a music recommender system using generative adversarial networks which is a novel deep 
learning model.
Implement alternative least square for collaborative filtering approach and
